ygData.subject: Re: Warriors vs Hybrids
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I wrote an e-mail to one of those guys from PPI - the ones who do the great analysis works of classs (see eq-stratis cleric for a sampling of their
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I wrote an e-mail to one of those guys from PPI - the ones who do the great
analysis works of classs (see eq-stratis cleric for a sampling of their work). I
told him of the things I have been reading here such as a critical strike (which
he didn't think would be accepted), increase what bind wound could do ( he
agreed that it should go up to 70-80%), increased skill cap (no comment from
him) and unique warrior skill (again no comment from him). His idea was to have
the warrior's defensives skill be increased some how. That would make the
warrior harder to hit and therefore less damage and less down time.

I am going to try to get him to join this mailing list since I feel he could
give great insight. He did say that they were not going to be writing anything
soon but said something about how a warrior could be tweeked to make a warrior
awsome.

Azlana
